raw_comment:
1. What do you notice? If your notice makes a claim, where in the graph is the evidence to support it?
I noticed that all forms of energy have increased over the years, some being more dramatic than others.
2. What do you wonder?
Why is it that nuclear generation has the steepest increase I use?
3. What impact does this have on you and your community?
This impacts all the electricity generation being used for all things that need electricity.
4. What's going on in this graph? Write a catchy headline that captures the graph's main idea.
Why does the World need more energy on the daily?
ace_sentences: I notice that all forms of energy have increased over the years.
Some forms of energy have increased more dramatically than other forms of energy.
I wonder why nuclear generation has the steepest increase.
This impacts the electricity generation that is used for all things that need electricity.
The headline is: Why does the world need more energy every day?
